lg.l: parva cāsya śataṃ pūrṇaṃ śrutvā bhāratasaṃhitām ||
atṛptaḥ puna papraccha vaiśampāyanam eva hi|
janamejaya yat pūrvaṃ tac chṛṇu tvam atandritaḥ ||
kathayasva hi me tṛptiṃ kuru yatnāt tapodhana ||
nirmalaṃ sarvagaṃ sūkṣmam akṣaraṃ kimu tatparam ||
kālapāśaiḥ kathaṃ baddho nirdehaś ca kathaṃ vrajet|
svargaṃ vā sa kathaṃ yāti nirdeho bahudharmakṛt|
etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ ||
karmahetuḥ śarīrasya utpattir nidhanaṃ ca yat|
tenaiva saha saṃyāti narakaṃ svargam eva vā|
yaṃ kālapāśam ity āhuḥ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi suvrata ||
na tvayā viditaṃ kiñcij jijñāsyasi kathaṃ dvija|
kālapāśaṃ ca viprendra sakalaṃ vettum arhasi ||
kalādviguṇitā kāṣṭhā kāṣṭhā vai triṃśatiḥ kalā|
ahorātraṃ punas triṃśan māsam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ||
samā dvādaśa māsāś ca kālatattvavido janāḥ|
ṣaṣṭiṃ caiva sahasrāṇi kālaḥ kaliyugaḥ smṛtaḥ|
tretā tu triguṇā jñeyā catuḥ kṛtayugaḥ smṛtaḥ|
eṣā caturyugāsaṃkhyā kṛtvā vai hy ekasaptatiḥ ||
kalpo manvantarāṇāṃ tu caturdaśa tu saṃkhyayā ||
kālacakraṃ bhramatvaiva viśramaṃ na ca vidmahe ||
kālaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate punaḥ|
kālasya vaśagāḥ sarve na kālavaśakṛt kvacit ||
eṣa kālo mahāyogī brahmā viṣṇuḥ paraḥ śivaḥ|
parārdhaṃ ca paraṃ caiva śrotuṃ vaḥ pratidīpitam ||
ekaṃ daśaṃ śataṃ caiva sahasram ayutaṃ tathā|
prayutaṃ niyutaṃ koṭim arbudaṃ vṛndam eva ca ||
kharvaṃ caiva nikharvaṃ ca śaṅkuḥ padmaṃ tathaiva ca|
samudro madhyam antaṃ ca parārdhaṃ ca paraṃ tathā ||
sarve daśaguṇā jñeyāḥ parārdhaṃ yāvad eva hi|
parāt parataraṃ nāsti iti me niścitā matiḥ|

app.lem: parāt parataraṃ nāsti iti me niścitā matiḥ
app.rdg: parāt parataraṃ nāsti iti me niścitā mati
vṛndañ caiva mahāvṛnda dviparānantam eva ca| parāt parataraṃ nāsti iti me niścitā matiḥ||

lg.l: brahmāṇḍaṃ kati vijñeyaṃ pramāṇaṃ prāpitaṃ kvacit|
kati cāṅgulimūrdheṣu sūryas tapati vai mahīm ||
brahmāṇḍānāṃ prasaṃkhyātuṃ mayā śakyaṃ kathaṃ dvija|
devās te 'pi na jānanti mānuṣāṇāṃ ca kā kathā ||
brahmaṇā yat purākhyāto mātariśvā yathā tathā ||
prabhāso bhāsano bhānuḥ pradyoto dyutimo dyutiḥ|
dīptatejāś ca tejāś ca tejā tejavaho daśa ||
āgneye tv etad ākhyātaṃ yāmye śṛṇv atha bho dvija|
nagajo naganā nando nagaro naga nandanaḥ ||
nagarbho gahano guhyo gūḍhajo daśa tatparaḥ|
vāruṇena pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu vipra nibodha me ||
jñātavyaś ca tathā samyag vṛṣajo vṛṣanandanaḥ|
nāyakā daśa vāyavye kīrtitā ye mayā dvija ||
sulabhaḥ sumanaḥ saumyaḥ suprajaḥ sutanuḥ śivaḥ|
sata satya layaḥ śambhur daśanāyakam uttare ||
indu bindu bhuvo vajra varado vara varṣaṇaḥ|
aparo vimalo moho nirmalo mana mohanaḥ|
akṣayaś cāvyayo viṣṇur varado madhyame daśa ||
ayutaṃ prayutair vṛndaiḥ prayutaṃ niyutair vṛtaḥ ||
ekaikasya parīvāro niyutaḥ pṛthag eva ca|
samudreṣu tathaikaikaṃ madhyasaṃkhyais tu tair vṛtam|
eṣa vai kathito vipra śakyaṃ sāṃkhyam udīritam ||
pramāṇaṃ śṛṇu me vipra saṃkṣepād bruvato mama|
pramāṇaṃ nāma saṃkhyā ca kīrtitāni samāsataḥ|
vāyunā pāda saṃkṣipya prāptaṃ cośanasaṃ purā|
tenāpi pāda saṃkṣipya prāptavāṃś ca bṛhaspatiḥ ||
gautamāc ca bharadvājas tasmād dharyadvatāya tu ||
rājaśravās tataḥ prāptaḥ somaśuṣmāya vai tataḥ|
somaśuṣmāt tataḥ prāptas tṛṇabindus tu bho dvija ||
tṛṇabindus tu vṛkṣāya vṛkṣaḥ śaktim abhāṣata|
śaktiḥ parāśaraṃ prāha jātūkarṇāya vai tataḥ ||
mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthāya kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi ||
śrutaṃ mayā janāgreṇa brahmāṇḍasya tu nirṇayam|
pramāṇaṃ varṇarūpaṃ ca saṃkhyā tasya samāsataḥ ||
kīdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vā kati ||
kasya vālayanaṃ jñeyaṃ pramāṇaṃ vātra vāsinaḥ|
kā vā tatra prajā jñeyā ko vā tatra prajāpatiḥ ||
śivāṇḍalakṣaṇaṃ vipra na tvaṃ praṣṭum ihārhasi|
daivatair api kā śaktir jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvataḥ ||
na prabhur netaras tatra na daṇḍyo na ca daṇḍakaḥ ||
na satyo nānṛtas tatra suśīlo no duḥśīlavān|
nānṛjur na ca dambhitvaṃ na tṛṣṇā na ca īrṣyatā ||
na krodho na ca lobho 'sti na māno 'sti na sūyakaḥ|
īrṣyā dveṣo na tatrāsti na śaṭho na ca matsaraḥ ||
na vyādhir na jarā tatra na śoko 'sti na viklavaḥ|
nādhamaḥ puruṣas tatra nottamo na ca madhyamaḥ ||
notkṛṣṭo mānavas tasmin striyaś caiva śivālaye|
na nindā na praśaṃsāsti matsarī piśuno na ca ||
yācamāno na tatrāsti dātā caiva na vidyate ||
na karma nāpriyas tatra na kaliḥ kalaho na ca ||
dvāparo na ca na tretā kṛtaṃ cāpi na vidyate|
manvantaraṃ na tatrāsti kalpaś caiva na vidyate ||
na janmamaraṇaṃ tatra āpadaṃ nāpnuyāt kvacit ||
na devā nāsurās tatra na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ ||
na bhūtā na piśācāś ca gandharvā ṛṣayas tathā|
na japo nāhnikas tatra nāgnihotrī na yajñakṛt|
na vrataṃ na tapaś caiva na tiryaṃ narakaṃ tathā ||
api varṣaśatenāpi śakyaṃ vaktuṃ na kenacit ||
kāmarūpāś ca te sarve kāmadāḥ kāmabhāṣiṇaḥ ||
aiśvaryatvaṃ na saṃkhyāsti balaśaktiś ca bho dvija|
adhordhvo na ca saṃkhyāsti na tiryañ caiti kaścana ||
śivāṇḍasya ca vistāram āyāmaṃ ca na vedmy aham|
bhogam akṣayas tatraiva janmamṛtyur na vidyate ||
īśānasya kalāḥ pañca vaktrasyāpi catuṣ kalāḥ|
aṣṭatriṃśat kalā hy etāḥ kīrtitā dvijasattama ||
saṃkhyā varṇā diśaś caiva ekaikasya pṛthak pṛthak|
śivayogaṃ vinā vipra tatra gantuṃ na śakyate ||
tatra gantuṃ na śakyeta devair api tapodhana ||
gaṅgādisarvatīrtheṣu snātvā taptvā ca vai punaḥ|
tatra gantuṃ na śakyeta ṛṣibhir vā mahātmabhiḥ ||
tatra gantuṃ na śakyeta vinā dhyānena niścayaḥ ||
svadehān māṃsam uddhṛtya dattvārthibhyaś ca niścayāt|
na tatra gantuṃ śakyeta anyair vāpi suduṣkaraiḥ ||
kimarthaṃ dharmam ity āhuḥ katimūrtiś ca kīrtyate|
katipādavṛṣo jñeyo gatis tasya kati smṛtāḥ ||
kasya putro muniśreṣṭha prajās tasya kati smṛtāḥ ||
dhṛtir ity eṣa dhātur vai paryāyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ|
ādhāraṇān mahattvāc ca dharma ity abhidhīyate ||
gatiś ca pañca vijñeyāḥ śṛṇu dharmasya bho dvija|
brahmaṇo hṛdayaṃ bhittvā jāto dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ|
tasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca anekāś ca babhūva ha|

app.lem: tasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca anekāś ca babhūva ha
app.rdg: gatiś ca pautrāś ca anekāś ca babhūva ha
tasya putrāś ca yotrāś ca anekāś ca babhūva ha
tasya putrā anekāś ca tathā pautrā babhūvahaḥ

lg.l: eṣa dharmanisargo 'yaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi ||
dharmapatnī viśeṣeṇa putras tebhyaḥ pṛthak pṛthak|
śraddhā lakṣmīr dhṛtis tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭir medhā kriyā lajjā|
buddhiḥ śāntir vapuḥ kīrtiḥ siddhiḥ prasūtisambhavāḥ ||
śraddhā kāmaḥ suto jāto darpo lakṣmīsutaḥ smṛtaḥ|
dhṛtyās tu niyamaḥ putraḥ saṃtoṣas tuṣṭijaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
puṣṭyā lābhaḥ suto jāto medhāputraḥ śrutas tathā|
kriyāyās tv abhayaḥ putro daṇḍaḥ samaya eva ca ||
lajjāyā vinayaḥ putro buddhyā bodhaḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ|
lajjāyāḥ sudhiyaḥ putra apramādaś ca tāv ubhau ||
kṣemaḥ śāntisuto vindyād vyavasāyo vapoḥ sutaḥ|
yaśaḥ kīrtisuto jñeyaḥ sukhaṃ siddher vyajāyata|
smārto varṇāśramācāro yamaiś ca niyamair yutaḥ ||
yamaś ca niyamaś caiva dvayor bhedam ataḥ śṛṇu|
ahiṃsā satyam asteyam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇā ||
dhanyāpramādo mādhuryam ārjavaṃ ca yamā daśa|
anāhatā mriyanty evaṃ vadho bandhanajaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
trāsanād vadham āpnoti anyair vāpi suduḥsahaiḥ ||
yasya yasya hared vittaṃ tasya tasya vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ|
ahiṃsā paramaṃ dharmaṃ yas tyajet sa durātmavān|
nātaḥ parataro mūrkho nātaḥ parataraṃ tamaḥ|
nātaḥ parataraṃ pāpaṃ nātaḥ parataraṃ viṣam|
yo hinasti na bhūtāni udbhijjādi caturvidham|
sarvabhūtadayāṃ nityaṃ yaḥ karoti sa paṇḍitaḥ|
sa yajvā sa tapasvī ca sa dātā sa dṛḍhavrataḥ ||
ahiṃsā paramaṃ tīrtham ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ|
ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham ||
ahiṃsā paramo yajñaḥ ahiṃsā paramaṃ vratam|
ahiṃsā paramaṃ jñānam ahiṃsā paramā kriyā ||
ahiṃsā paramaṃ śaucam ahiṃsā paramo damaḥ|
ahiṃsā paramo lābhaḥ ahiṃsā paramaṃ yaśaḥ ||
ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramā gatiḥ|
ahiṃsā paramaṃ brahma ahiṃsā paramaḥ śivaḥ ||
sa mahat phalam āpnoti yas tu māṃsaṃ vivarjayet ||
anabhyarcya pitṝn devān na tato 'nyo 'sti pāpakṛt ||
atraiva paśavo hiṃsyā nānyatra manur abravīt ||
krītvā svayaṃ vāpy utpādya paropahṛtam eva vā|
devān pitṝṃś cārcayitvā khādan māṃsaṃ na doṣabhāk ||
tasmān māṃsaṃ na hīheta balakāmena bho dvija|
iha loke yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ paratra ca parā gatiḥ ||
tīrthānāṃ ca sahasrakoṭiniyutaṃ snātvā sakṛn mānavaḥ
sadbhāvaḥ satyam ity āhur dṛṣṭapratyayam eva vā|
kṣamate yo jitātmā tu sa ca satyam udāhṛtam ||
vadhārtham udyataḥ śastraṃ yadi pṛccheta karhicit|
na tatra satyaṃ vaktavyam anṛtaṃ satyam ucyate ||
vadhārhaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścid vrajet pathi bhayāturaḥ|
pṛcchato 'pi na vaktavyaṃ satyaṃ tad vāpi ucyate ||
satyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca satyaṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ||
satyaṃ potaḥ paratrārthaṃ satyaṃ panthāna vistaram ||
satyam iṣṭagatiḥ proktaṃ satyaṃ yajñam anuttamam|
satyaṃ tīrthaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ satyaṃ dānam anantakam ||
satyaṃ śīlaṃ tapo jñānaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ|
satyaṃ sopānam ūrdhvasya satyaṃ kīrtir yaśaḥ sukham ||
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam|
satyena tapate sūryaḥ satyena pṛthivī sthitā|
satyena vāyavo vānti satye toyaṃ ca śītalam ||
satyena vindhyās tiṣṭhanti vardhamāno na vardhate ||
lokālokaḥ sthitaḥ satye meruḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ|
vedās tiṣṭhanti satyeṣu dharmaḥ satye pratiṣṭhati ||
satyaṃ gauḥ kṣarate kṣīraṃ satyaṃ kṣīre ghṛtaṃ sthitam|
satye jīvaḥ sthito dehe satyaṃ jīvaḥ sanātanaḥ ||
na hi tṛptiṃ vijānāmi śrutvā dharmaṃ tavāpy aham|
steyaṃ śṛṇv atha viprendra pañcadhā parikīrtitam|
adattādānam ādau tu utkocaṃ ca tataḥ param|
apahṛtya dhanaṃ mūḍhaḥ sa coraś cora ucyate ||
nāsti steyasamaṃ pāpaṃ nāsty adharmaś ca tatsamaḥ|
pracchanno hriyate 'rtham anyapuruṣaḥ pratyakṣam anyo haret
stenastulya na mūḍham asti puruṣo dharmārthahīno 'dhamaḥ
yāvaj jīvati śaṅkayā narapateḥ saṃtrasyamāno raṭan|
kālena mriyate sa yāti nirayam ākrandamāno bhṛśam ||
nītvā durgatikoṭikalpa nirayāt tiryatvam āyānti te
tiryatve ca tathaivam ekaśatikaṃ prabhramya varṣārbudam|
tasmād durgatihetu karma sakalaṃ tyaktvā śivaṃ cāśrayet ||
aṣṭamūrtiśivadveṣṭā pitur mātuś ca yo dviṣet|
gavāṃ vā atither dveṣṭā nṛśaṃsāḥ pañca eva te ||
sūryaḥ somaś ca dīkṣaś ca dūṣakaḥ tannṛśaṃsakaḥ ||
pṛthvyā gurutarī mātā ko na vandeta mātaram|
gāvaḥ pavitraṃ maṅgalyaṃ devatānāṃ ca devatāḥ|
sarvadevamayā gāvas tasmād eva na hiṃsayet ||
jātamātrasya lokasya gāvas trātā na saṃśayaḥ|
ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi mūtraṃ śakṛt karṣaṇam eva ca ||
gobhir na tulyaṃ dhanam asti kiṃcid

app.rdg: labhaty asau tam anṛtaṃ sa karttā

lg.l: atithiṃ yo na pīḍyeta atithiṃ yo na duṣyati|
cintayen manasā bhaktyā dharmaḥ svayam ihāgataḥ ||
sa tasya sakalaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnuyān nātra saṃśayaḥ ||
viditaṃ ca tvayā pūrvaṃ prasthavārttā ca kīrtitā ||
damo dharmo damaḥ svargo damaḥ kīrtir damaḥ sukham ||
damo yajño damas tīrthaṃ damaḥ puṇyaṃ damas tapaḥ|
tvag jihvā ca tathā ghrāṇā cakṣuḥ śravaṇam indriyāḥ ||
damaṃ yo jayate samyag nirdamo nidhanaṃ vrajet ||
mṛge śrotravaśān mṛtyuḥ pataṅgāś cakṣuṣor mṛtāḥ|
ghrāṇayā bhramaro naṣṭo naṣṭo mīnaś ca jihvayā ||
kiṃ punaḥ pañcabhuktānāṃ mṛtyus tebhyaḥ kim adbhutam ||
atidyūtān nalo rājā nṛgo goharaṇena tu ||
svargaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca nāsti|
nirghṛṇo na paratrāsti nirghṛṇo na ihāsti vai|
nirghṛṇe na ca dharmo 'sti nirghṛṇe na tapo 'sti vai ||
parastrī śṛṇu viprendra ghṛṇīkāryā sadā budhaiḥ|
paranindā ca kā vipra śṛṇu vakṣye samāsataḥ|
parānneṣu ghṛṇā kāryā abhojyeṣu ca bhojanam|
prajñābodhaśrutiṃ smṛtiṃ ca labhate mānaṃ ca nityaṃ labhet
dākṣiṇyaṃ sa bhavet sa āyuṣa paraṃ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayaḥ ||
kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca mohaś caiva caturvidhaḥ|
ātmatattvaḥ smṛto dharmo vidyā pañcasu pañcadhā|
dhanyās te yair idaṃ vetti nikhilena dvijottama|
āyuḥ kīrtir yaśaḥ saukhyaṃ dhanyād eva pravardhate|
śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ smṛtir medhā jāyate dhanyamānave ||
mahāpātakam ity āhus tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ ||
anṛtaṃ ca samutkarṣe rājagāmī ca paiśunaḥ|
sakhyuḥ putrasya ca strīṣu gurutalpasamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
catvāra ete sambhūya yat pāpaṃ kurute naraḥ|
kṣute jīveti vā noktaṃ tasya kiṃ parataḥ phalam ||
ārjavo na vṛthā yajña ārjavo na vṛthā tapaḥ|

app.lem: ārjavo na vṛthā yajña ārjavo na vṛthā tapaḥ
app.rdg: ārjavo na vṛthā yajña ārjavo na vṛthā tapa
ārjavo na vṛthā yajñaś cārrjavo na vṛthā tapaḥ

lg.l: ārjavo na vṛthā dānam ārjavo na vṛthāgnayaḥ ||
ārjavasya sadā devāḥ kāye tasya caranti te ||
iha parata sukhārthaṃ kārayet taṃ manuṣyaḥ|
vratopavāsamaunaṃ ca snānaṃ ca niyamā daśa ||
śārīraśaucam āhāro mātrā bhāvaś ca pañcamaḥ ||
tāḍayen na ca bandheta na ca prāṇair viyojayet|
ekopasthe gude pañca tathaikatra kare daśa|
ubhayoḥ sapta dātavyā mṛdaḥ śuddhiṃ samīhatā ||
bhāgadvayaṃ tu bhuñjīta bhāgam ekaṃ jalaṃ pibet|
abhakṣyaṃ ca na bhakṣeta apeyaṃ na ca pāyayet|
agamyaṃ na ca gamyeta avācyaṃ na ca bhāṣayet ||
laśunaṃ ca palāṇḍuṃ ca gṛñjanaṃ kacakāni ca|
gauraṃ ca śūkaraṃ māṃsaṃ varjayec ca vidhānataḥ ||
chattrākaṃ viḍvarāhaṃ ca gomāṃsaṃ ca na bhakṣayet|
caṭakaṃ ca kapotaṃ ca jālapādāṃś ca varjayet ||
kākolūkaṃ balākaṃ ca matsyādīṃś cāpi varjayet ||
amedhyāṃś cāpavitrāṃś ca sarvān eva vivarjayet|
tvayā jijñāsito 'smy adya saṃkṣiptaḥ kathito mayā|
sarveṣām eva śaucānām arthaśaucaṃ paraṃ smṛtam ||
yo 'rthe hi śuciḥ sa śucir na mṛdvāriśuciḥ śuciḥ|

app.lem: yo 'rthe hi śuciḥ sa śucir na
app.rdg: yo 'rthe hi śuciḥ sa śuci na

lg.l: jñānaṃ dhyānaṃ ca pañcaitat pravakṣyāmi pṛthak pṛthak ||
aṣṭakāḥ pārvaṇī śrāddhaṃ dravyayajñaḥ sa ucyate ||
dhyānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ caiva kīrtitaṃ hariṇā purā|
sūryaḥ somo 'gni sphaṭikaḥ sūkṣmaṃ tattvaṃ ca pañcamam ||
sūryamaṇḍalam ādau tu tattvaṃ prakṛtir ucyate|
tasya madhye śaśiṃ dhyāyet tattvaṃ puruṣa ucyate ||
vidyātattvaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kāraṇam ajam avyayam ||
ekaikasya hi tattvasya phalaṃ kīrtaya kīdṛśam|
kāni lokāḥ prapadyante kālaṃ vāsya tapodhana ||
dvitīyaṃ tattva puruṣaṃ dhyāyamāno mṛto yadi|
pañcamaṃ śivatattvaṃ tu sūkṣmaṃ cātmani saṃsthitam|
na kālasaṃkhyā tatrāsti śivena saha modate ||
janmenaikena muktir bhavati kimu na vā mānavāḥ sādhayantu
mānasaṃ tapa ādau tu dvitīyaṃ vācikaṃ tapaḥ|
kāyikaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ tu manovākkarma tatparam|
kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ caiva tapo miśraka pañcamam ||
manaḥsaumyaṃ prasādaś ca ātmanigraham eva ca|
maunaṃ bhāvaviśuddhiś ca pañcaitat tapa mānasam ||
anudvegakarā vāṇī priyaṃ satyaṃ hitaṃ ca yat|
ārjavaṃ ca ahiṃsā ca brahmacaryaṃ surārcanam|
śaucaṃ pañcamam ity etat kāyikaṃ tapa ucayate ||
iṣṭaṃ kalyāṇabhāvaṃ ca dhanyaṃ pathyaṃ hitaṃ vadet|
puṣpam utpādya dānaṃ ca sarve te tapa sādhanāḥ ||
āśāpāśa vimucya nirmalamatis tyaktvā jaghanyaṃ phalam|
dānāni ca tathety āhuḥ pañcadhā munibhiḥ purā|
annaṃ vastraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca bhūmi godāna pañcamam ||
annāt tejaḥ smṛtiḥ prāṇaḥ annāt puṣṭir vapuḥ sukham|
annāc chrīḥ kānti vīryaṃ ca annāt sattvaṃ ca jāyate ||
annāj jīvanti bhūtāni annaṃ tuṣṭikaraṃ sadā|
ānnāt kāmo mado darpaḥ annāc chauryaṃ ca jāyate ||
annadānāc ca saubhāgyaṃ khyātiḥ kīrtiś ca jāyate ||
annadaḥ prāṇadaś caiva prāṇadaś cāpi sarvadaḥ|
tasmād annasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ||
apamānam avajñāṃ ca vastrahīno hy avāpnuyāt|
na jīrṇaṃ sphuṭitaṃ dadyād vastraṃ kutsitam eva vā ||
yādṛśaṃ dīyate vastraṃ tādṛśaṃ prāpyate phalam|
śobhanaṃ dīyate vastraṃ śobhanaṃ vastram āpnuyāt ||
dadyād vastra suśobhanaṃ dvijavare kāle śubhe sādaram
saubhāgyam atulaṃ labheta sa naro rūpaṃ tathā śobhanam|
tasmin yāti suvastrakoṭi śataśaḥ prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayam
tasmāt tvaṃ kuru vastradānam asakṛt pāratrikotkarṣaṇam ||
dattvā suvarṇaṃ viprebhyo devebhyaś ca dvijarṣabha|
raktimāṣakakarṣaṃ vā palārdhaṃ palam eva vā|
evam eva phalaṃ vṛddhir jñeyā dānaviśeṣataḥ ||
bhūmidānasamaṃ vipra yady asti vada tattvataḥ ||
ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā pañcāśac chatam eva vā|

app.rdg: pañcāśac chatam eva vā| sahāyutalakṣam vā bhūmidaṃ praśasyate

lg.l: ekahastāṃ ca yo bhūmiṃ dadyād dvijavarāya tu|
evaṃ bahuṣu hasteṣu guṇāguṇi phalaṃ smṛtam|
śraddhādhikaṃ phalaṃ dānaṃ kathitaṃ te dvijottama ||
jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa bhūmiṃ dattvā dvijāya vai|
āyur akṣayam āptaṃ tu ihaiva ca dvijottama ||
annaṃ vastrahiraṇyaraupyam udakaṃ gāvas tilān medinīm|
dadyāt pādukachattrapīṭhakalaśaṃ pātrādyam anyac ca vā
dānād eva yaśaḥ śriyaḥ sukhakarāḥ khyātiṃ ca tulyāṃ labhet
dānād eva nigarhaṇaṃ ripugaṇe ānandadaṃ saukhyadam|
dānād durjayatā prasādam atulaṃ saubhāgya dānāl labhet
dānād eva anantabhoga niyataṃ svargaṃ ca tasmād bhavet ||
dānād eva ca śakralokasakalaṃ dānāj janānandanam
dānād eva mahīṃ samasta bubhuje samrāḍ mahīmaṇḍale|
śaivaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca smārtaṃ bhāratasaṃhitām ||
itihāsam adhīyānaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa naro bhavet|
striyo vā garhitotsargaḥ svayaṃmuktiś ca kīrtyate|
agamyā strī divā parve dharmapatny api vā bhavet|
svayaṃmuktir iyaṃ jñeyā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet ||
svapne strīṣu ramante ca retaḥ prakṣarate tataḥ ||
divāśayaṃ na kartavyaṃ nityaṃ dharmapareṇa tu|
svargamārgārgalā hy etāḥ striyo nāma prakīrtitāḥ ||
mūtraviṣṭhe na bhūmīṣu kurute śvānadaḥ sadā|
mūtravarco na rudhyeta sadā govratiko naraḥ|
kṣamate pṛthivī devī evam eva mahīvrataḥ ||
vratapañcakam ity etad yaś careta jitendriyaḥ|
sa cottamam idaṃ lokaṃ prāpnoti na ca saṃśayaḥ ||
śeṣānnam antarānnaṃ ca naktāyācitam eva ca|
upavāsaṃ ca pañcaitat kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu ||
antarā prātarāśī ca sāyamāśī tathaiva ca|
sadopavāsī bhavati yo na bhuṅkte kadācana ||
na divā bhojanaṃ kāryaṃ rātrau naiva ca bhojayet|
parair dattaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte tam ayācitam ucyate ||
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca pañcamam|
na kāṅkṣen nopayuñjīta upavāsaḥ sa ucyate ||
asambhūtam adṛṣṭaṃ ca dharmāc cāpi bahiṣkṛtam|
mṛtamātā pitā caiva hānisthānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet|
hṛdi na sphuṭase mūḍha śiro vā na vidāryase|
evam ādīny anekāni tīkṣṇavādī sa ucyate ||
maunam eva sadā kāryaṃ vākyasaubhāgyam icchatā|
yas tu maunasya no kartā dūṣitaḥ sa kulādhamaḥ|
janme janme ca durgandho mūkaś caivopajāyate ||
tasmān maunavrataṃ sadaiva sudṛḍhaṃ kurvīta yo niścitaṃ
vācā tasya alaṅghyatā ca bhavati sarvāṃ sabhāṃ nandati|
vaktrāc cotpalagandham asya satataṃ vāyanti gandhotkaṭāḥ
āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ brāhmyaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyam eva ca ||
āgneyaṃ bhasmanā snānaṃ toyāc chataguṇaṃ phalam|
tasmād bhasma prayuñjīta dehināṃ tu malāpaham|
vāruṇaṃ salilaṃ snānaṃ kartavyaṃ vividhaṃ naraiḥ|
brahmasnānaṃ ca viprendra āpohiṣṭhaṃ vidur budhāḥ|
trisaṃdhyam eva kartavyaṃ brahmasnānaṃ tad ucyate ||

app.rdg: sāttviko bhagav viṣṇu rājasaḥ kamalodbhavaḥ| tāmaso bhagavān īśaḥ sakalaṃ vika kiñci

lg.l: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathā|
tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva anyonyamithunāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
svarge 'pi hi trayo vaite bhāvanīyās tapodhana|
mānuṣeṣu ca tiryeṣu guṇabhedās trayas trayaḥ ||
brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca dharma indraḥ prajāpatiḥ|
somo 'gnir varuṇaḥ sūryo daśa sattvottamāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
tārā grahāḥ surā yakṣā gandharvāḥ kiṃnaroragāḥ|
śārikāś ca kuliṅgāś ca daśaite tamasādhamāḥ ||
dayā satyaṃ damaḥ śaucaṃ jñānaṃ maunaṃ tapaḥ kṣamā|
śīlaṃ ca nābhimānaṃ ca sāttvikāś cottamā janāḥ ||
bālako nipuṇo rāgī māno darpaś ca lobhakaḥ|
spṛhā īrṣā pralāpī ca rājasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam ||
krodhaḥ piśuna nidrā ca tāmasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam ||
atyuṣṇam āmlalavaṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vidāhi ca|
abhakṣyāmedhyapūtī ca pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat|
ātmavat sarvabhūtāni samyak paśyeta bho dvija|
īrṣādveṣasamo yas tu sukhaduḥkhasamāś ca ye|
stutinindāsamā ye ca guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate ||
kathayasva muniśreṣṭha yady asti bhuvi kāmadam ||
atiguhyam idaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ snehād dvijottama|
bravīmi vaḥ purāvṛttaṃ nandinā kathito 'smy aham ||
tatrāsīnaṃ śivaṃ sākṣād devī vacanam abravīt ||
praṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ tv ekaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ sanātanam ||
atitīrthaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ saṃsārād yena mucyate|
ko māṃ pṛcchati taṃ praśnaṃ muktvā tvām eva sundari|
śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tat praśnaṃ devair api sudurlabham ||
kurukṣetraṃ prayāgaṃ ca vārāṇasīm ataḥ param|
kiṃ na jānāmi tat tīrthaṃ sulabhaṃ durlabhaṃ ca yat|
kuruḥ puruṣa vijñeyaḥ śarīraṃ kṣetra ucyate|
evam eva phalaṃ teṣāṃ tīrthapañcadaśeṣu ca|
sulabhaṃ sukaraṃ sūkṣmaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭiś ca me gatā ||
suṣumnā bhagavatī gaṅgā iḍā ca yamunā nadī|
etā srotavahā nadyaḥ prayāgaḥ sa vidhīyate ||
dakṣiṇā vāruṇī nāsā vāmanāsā asi smṛtā|
ahorātram avicchinnaṃ gaṅgā sā tena ucyate ||
taṃ tu śrutvā na saṃdehaḥ sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet ||
tat tad akṣaram ākarṇya amṛtatvāya kalpate ||
naimiṣaṃ śṛṇu deveśi nimiṣā pratyayo bhavet|
samyag chāyāṃ nirīkṣeta ātmāno vā parasya vā ||
dṛṣṭvā pratyayam evaṃ hi naimiṣajñaḥ sa ucyate ||
tīrthaṃ bindusaraṃ nāma śṛṇu vakṣyāmi sundari|
dehamadhye hṛdi jñeyaṃ hṛdimadhye tu paṅkajam ||
bindumadhye sthito nādaḥ sa nādaḥ kena bhidyate ||
ukāraṃ ca makāraṃ ca bhittvā nādo vinirgataḥ|
taṃ viditvā viśālākṣi so 'mṛtatvaṃ labheta ca ||
tṛpyante tena nityaṃ hṛdi kamalapuṭaṃ sthānubhūtāntarātmā|
yas taṃ vetti sa vetti vedanikhilaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhacchidam
prāptaṃ tena na saṃśayaḥ śivapadaṃ duṣprāpya devair api ||

app.lem: prāptaṃ tena na saṃśayaḥ śivapadaṃ duṣprāpya devair api
app.rdg: prāptaṃ tena na saṃśayaṃ śivapadaṃ duṣprāpya devair api
prāptaṃ tena na saṃśayaḥ śivadaṃ duṣprāpya devair api
prā yaḥ śiva ya devair api

lg.l: na tulyaṃ tava paśyāmi dayā bhūteṣu bhāmini|
kim anyat kathayiṣyāmi dayā yatra na vidyate ||
vinārthena tu yo yajñaḥ sa yajñaḥ sārvakāmikaḥ|
śodhite tu phalaṃ śuddham aśuddhe niṣphalaṃ bhavet ||
manaḥśuddhis tu prathamaṃ dravyaśuddhir ataḥ param|
mantraśuddhis tṛtīyā tu karmaśuddhir ataḥ param|
pañcamī sattvaśuddhis tu kratuśuddhiś ca pañcadhā ||
vidhim evaṃ yadā śudhyed yadi yajñaṃ karoti hi|
tasya yajñaphalāvāptir janmamṛtyuś ca no bhavet ||
vinārthena tu yo yajñaṃ karoti varasundari|
śraddhā patnī viśālākṣi saṃkalpaḥ pada śāśvatam ||
brahmasūtraṃ trayas tattvaṃ bodhanā muṇḍitaṃ śiraḥ ||
dakṣiṇām abhayaṃ bhūte dattvā yajñaṃ yajet sadā ||
vrataṃ brahmaparaṃ dhyānaṃ sāvitrī prakṛtau layaḥ|
dama daṇḍa dayā pātraṃ bhikṣā saṃsāramocanam|
dvitīya āśramo devi yathāha bhagavān śivaḥ|
adhibhūtaḥ smṛto mātā adhyātmaś ca pitā tathā|
śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ smṛtā bhāryā prajñā putraḥ kṣamānujaḥ|
maitrī bandhur jaṭā cāpaṃ karuṇā supavitrakam ||
vānaprastham ayaṃ dharmaṃ yat pūrvam avadhāritam ||
? śraddhāpūrvakam eva yaḥ saniyamaṃ sākṣāc ca jīvan śivaḥ ||
varjayen madhu māṃsāni paradārāṃś ca varjayet|
varjayec ciravāsaṃ ca paravāsaṃ ca varjayet ||
varjayet sṛṣṭabhojyāni bhikṣām ekāṃ ca varjayet|
varjayet saṃgrahaṃ nityam abhimānaṃ ca varjayet ||
susūkṣmaṃ manasā dhyātvā śucau pādaṃ vinikṣipet|
na kupyeta anālābhe lābhe vāpi na harṣayet ||
stutinindā samaṃ kṛtvā priyaṃ vāpriyam eva vā ||
nirālambaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā buddhiṃ kṛtvā nirañjanām ||
ātmānaṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā khaṃ ca kṛtvā manonmanam|
nyased dharmam adharmaṃ ca īrṣyādveṣaṃ parityajet|
na cāsīta na tiṣṭheta na ca dehīti vā vadet ||
yathālābhena varteta aṣṭau piṇḍān dine dine|
atītaṃ ca bhaviṣyaṃ ca na bhikṣuś cintayet sadā|
virāgaṃ tu dhanuḥ kṛtvā prāṇāyāmaguṇair yutam|
anakṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma cintayet satataṃ dvija ||
brahmaṇo hṛdayaṃ viṣṇur viṣṇoś ca hṛdayaṃ śivaḥ|
śivasya hṛdayaṃ saṃdhyā tasmāt saṃdhyām upāsayet ||
dhyāyen nityam atandrito hy anupamaṃ vyaktātmavedyaṃ śivam|
ātithyakānāṃ dharmaṃ ca kathayasva yad uttamam ||
ahiṃsātithyakānāṃ ca śṛṇu dharmaṃ yad uttamam|
kapilasya suto vidvān vipulo nāma viśrutaḥ ||
brahmaṇyaś ca kṛtajñaś ca madbhaktaḥ kṛtaniścayaḥ ||
atha kenāpi kālena sūryarāgam abhūt tataḥ|
devāś ca pitaraś caiva tarpyante vidhivat tathā ||
kecij juhvati tatrāgniṃ kecid viprāṃś ca tarpayet|
yadi satyaṃ pradātāsi suprasannaṃ manas tava ||
śīghram ājñāpaya vipra yac cābhilaṣitaṃ tava|
yady evaṃ vadase bhadra bhāryāṃ me dehi rūpiṇīm|
svasti bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kalyāṇaṃ bhava śāśvatam ||
parityājyā kathaṃ nātha apāpāṃ tyajase katham|
atīva hi priyāṃ bhāryāṃ nirdoṣāṃ sa kathaṃ tyajeḥ ||
sakhā bhāryā manuṣyāṇām iha loke paratra ca|
dānaṃ vā sumahad dattvā yajño vā subahuḥ kṛtaḥ ||
aputro nāpnuyāt svargaṃ tapobhir vā suduṣkaraiḥ|
śruto me pitṛbhiḥ prokto brāhmaṇaiś ca mamāntike ||
aputro nāpnuyāt svargaṃ śrutaṃ me bahuśaḥ purā|
dānāni ca bahūn dattvā yajñāṃś ca vividhāṃs tathā|
vedāṃś ca japa yajñāṃś ca kṛtvā tad dvijasattamaḥ ||
aputro nāpnuyāt svargaṃ yadi yajñaśatair api ||
ity uktas tu cyutaḥ svargān mandapālo mahān ṛṣiḥ|
putrān utpādayām āsa śāraṅgāś caturo dvijaḥ ||
tena puṇyaprabhāveṇa svargaṃ prāpto hy avāritaḥ|
kulatrāṇāt kalatrāsmi bharaṇād bhārya eva ca ||
yāni santi gṛhe dravyaṃ grāmaghoṣagṛhāṇi ca ||
dātum arhasi viprāya na māṃ dātum ihārhasi|
bhāryāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā vipulaḥ punar abravīt ||
sādhu bhāmini jānāmi sādhu sādhu pativrate|
jito 'smy anena vākyena anenāsmi hi toṣitaḥ ||
adya grahaṇakāle ca dvija āgatya yācate|
narakaṃ yadi gacchāmi kulena saha sundari|
muktim eva na paśyāmi janmakoṭiśatair api|
dānena tu śubhaṃ paśye svargaloke yad akṣayam|
noktaṃ mayānṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ nityaṃ satyavrate sthitaḥ ||
bhāryā dharmasakhety evaṃ tvayi pūrvam udāhṛtam ||
jijñāsārtham ahaṃ bhadre na vighnaṃ kartum arhasi|
mātāvyaktaḥ pitā brahmā buddhir bhāryā damaḥ sakhā ||
putro dharmaḥ kriyācārya ity ete mama bāndhavāḥ|
kālaśreṣṭho grahaḥ sūryo gaṅgā śreṣṭhā nadīṣu ca ||
sarvasvaṃ brāhmaṇe dattvā vanam evāśrayāmy aham ||
yāni santi gṛhe dravyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavas tathā|
prīyatāṃ bhagavān dharmaḥ prīyatāṃ ca maheśvaraḥ|
prīyantāṃ pitaraḥ sarve yady asti sukṛtaṃ phalam ||
vaset tatra gṛhe ramye bhāryām ādāya tasya ca|
vipulas tu namaskṛtvā kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam ||
ekākī vijane śūnye cintayā ca pariplutaḥ|
kva gacchāmi kva bhokṣyāmi kutra vā kiṃ karomy aham ||
na pathaṃ viṣayaṃ vedmi grāmaṃ vā nagarāṇi vā|
evam uktvā tu vipulaḥ śanaiḥ parvatam āruhat|
etasminn eva kāle tu vṛkṣaśākhāvatārya ca|
apūrvaṃ ca surūpaṃ ca sugandhatvaṃ ca śobhanam ||
phalaṃ gṛhya vicitraṃ ca hṛdayānandanaṃ śubham|
vipulaś citravad dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ|
aho vā svapnabhūto 'smi aho vā tapasaḥ phalam ||
na paśyāmi na jighrāmi na ca svādaṃ ca vedmy aham|
vārttāpi na ca me śrotrā pratijānāmi kaṃcana ||
evam uktvā hy anekāni phalaṃ gṛhya manoramam|
sunirīkṣya punar jighraṃ punar jighraṃ nirīkṣya ca ||
phalaṃ cātra nirūpyanto deśaṃ vāpy avalokayan|
tat phalaṃ pratigṛhyaiva nagaraṃ praviśāmy aham|
prārthayitvā ca yat kiṃcij jīvanārthaṃ carāmy aham ||
tataḥ śailam atikramya nagaraṃ praviveśa ha|
pathi kaścij janaḥ pṛṣṭhaḥ kiṃnāma nagaraṃ tv idam ||
sa hovāca pathī kena kim apūrvam ihāgataḥ|
rājā siṃhajaṭo nāma rājñī tasya ca kekayī|
ativṛddho jarāgrastaḥ kekayī ca tathaiva ca ||
atra śreṣṭhim upāsyāmi nāma vā tasya kiṃ vada|
katamo deśas tadvāsaḥ kathayasva na saṃśayaḥ ||
vipulenaivam uktas tu pathikovāca taṃ punaḥ|
śreṣṭhikaḥ puṇḍako nāma khyātaḥ śreṣṭhika ucyate|
kautukaṃ tava yady asti tad āgaccha mayā saha ||
evam astv iti tenokto vipulena mahātmanā|
tenaiva saha niryātaḥ śreṣṭhikasya gṛhaṃ prati ||
śreṣṭhikaḥ svagṛhāsīno dṛṣṭaḥ sa vipulena tu|
tasyāntikam upāgamya tat phalaṃ sa niveditaḥ ||
aho phalam idaṃ śreṣṭham aho phalam ihānitam|
aho rūpam aho gandham aho phalaṃ suśobhanam ||
tat phalaṃ na mahījātaṃ na merau na ca kandare|
aho 'smi saphalaṃ bhoktā rājārhaś ca na saṃśayaḥ|
ḍhaukayitvā phalaṃ divyaṃ rājānaṃ toṣayāmy aham ||
tatas tvarita gatvaiva phalaṃ gṛhya manoharam|
rājā ca sa phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ|
kutaḥ śreṣṭhi tvayā nītaṃ phalaṃ sarvamanoharam ||
sadya evopabhuñjāmi tvayā dattam idaṃ phalam|
kīdṛśaṃ svāda vijñātum icchāmi kuru māciram ||
tataḥ sa bhakṣayām āsa phalaṃ cāmṛtasaṃnibham|
na valīpalitaṃ sadyo na jarā na ca durbalaḥ ||
paurastrī bālavṛddhāś ca sarve te vismayaṃ gatāḥ ||
rājā siṃhajaṭo nāma tuṣṭim eva parāṃ gataḥ|
praharṣam atulaṃ caiva prāptavān sa nareśvaraḥ ||
kuru bhīmabalas tv evaṃ phalam ānaya adya vai ||
kekayīṃ durbalāṃ vṛddhāṃ punaḥ prāpaya yauvanam ||
sa rājñā evam uktas tu śreṣṭhī bhīmabalas tathā|
pratyuvāca ha rājānaṃ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ ||
na phaledaṃ vane rājan na vāṇijyakṛṣeṇa vā|
datto 'smi tena rājendra mayā datto 'si bhūpate|
na te śaknomy ahaṃ rājan vaktuṃ vaideśinaṃ naram ||
yadi nāsti kim etat taṃ mayā vā mārgito bhavān|
āgamopāyamārgaṃ ca tenaiva sa tu gamyatām|
avaśyaṃ tena gantavyaṃ tena mārgeṇa mārgaya ||
adattvā phalam anyac ca śiraś chedyāmi durmate|
tato bhīmabalaḥ kruddhaḥ khaḍgaṃ gṛhya śaśiprabham|
alaṅghya vacanaṃ rājñaḥ kulaputra vraja tvaram ||
mā ruṣa kulaputra tvaṃ mayā vadhyo bhaviṣyasi|
yady asti phalam anyad vā dehi rājānam adya vai ||
yatra prāptaṃ phalaṃ divyaṃ tatra vā deśaya tava|
tatphalena vinā bhadra durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam ||
kṛtakartā kathaṃ vadhyaḥ prāpnuyām aham adya vai ||
phalaṃ vā na punas tv anyad dātuṃ śakyaṃ na kenacit|
vānaras tat phalaṃ gṛhya mama dattvā punar gataḥ|
mayā dattam idaṃ tubhyaṃ tvayāpi ca narādhipe ||
tatra gacchāva bho śreṣṭhi dṛśyate yadi vānaraḥ|
tvayā mayā ca gatvaiva yācāvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ ||
śreṣṭhinā ca tathety āha gacchāmaḥ sahitā vayam|
yatra prāptaṃ phalaṃ tubhyaṃ mokṣayāmo na saṃśayaḥ ||
tam āruhya giriṃ sahyaṃ mārgamāṇaḥ samantataḥ|
vānara kuru mitrārthaṃ sadyo mṛtyur bhaven mama|
pūrvadattaṃ phalam anyad dehi vānara jīvaya ||
gandharveṇa tu me dattaṃ phalaṃ dattaṃ tu te mayā|
punar anyat kathaṃ dāsye tatra gaccha yadīcchasi ||
adattvā tat phalaṃ tubhyaṃ jīvituṃ saṃśayo bhavet|
athavā tatra gacchāmo yatra citrarathaḥ svayam ||
vānaraḥ punar evāha evaṃ kurvāmahe vayam|
gandharvarāja kāryārthī tvāt hy aham punar āgataḥ|
pūrvadattaphalaṃ tv anyad dehi māṃ yadi śakyate ||
mayā dattaṃ phalaṃ tubhyam atyantasuhṛdo 'si me ||
kuto 'nyat phalam ādāsye mama nāsti plavaṅgama|
gandharvenaivam uktas tu tathety āha plavaṅgamaḥ|
pūrvadattaphalaṃ tv anyad dehi jīvam anāśaya ||
sa phalaṃ dattam evāsi suhṛdatvān mayā tava ||
anyad dātuṃ na śaknomi gaccha somapurādya vai|
gatāḥ sūryāgrataḥ kṛtvā somalokaṃ tathaiva hi|
kimartham āgato bhūyaḥ kartavyaṃ tatra bhāskara|
phalaṃ dātuṃ punas tv anyan muktvā tv anyat karomy aham ||

app.lem: punas tv anyan muktvā tv anyat ka
app.rdg: punas tv anya muktvā tv anyaṅ ka
punas tv anyan muktvās tv anyaṃ ka
punas tv anyat muktā tv anyaṅ ka

lg.l: yadi śakyaṃ phalaṃ dehi anyan na prārthayāmy aham|
na dattāsi phalam anyan mayā vaddhyo bhaviṣyasi ||
indreṇāsmi phalaṃ dattaṃ saphalaṃ datta me bhavān ||
gatvaivendrasadas tv anyat prārthayāmaḥ sahaiva tu|
evaṃ kurma iti prāha gatvendrasadanaṃ prati ||
pūrvadattaphalam anyad dehi śakra mamādya vai ||
yadartham iha samprāptaḥ sa ca nāsti niśākara|
viṣṇuhastān mayā prāptam ekam eva phalaṃ śubham ||
sarva eva hi gacchāmo viṣṇulokaṃ graheśvara|
na śaknomi phalaṃ dātuṃ kiṃ vā tv anyat karomy aham ||
brahmāṇḍam api bhettuṃ tvaṃ śaknoṣi garuḍadhvaja|
evam uktvā punar viṣṇuḥ pratyuvāca purandaram|
phalam ekaṃ parityajya sarvaṃ śaknomi kauśika ||
brahmaṇā ca mama dattaṃ tat phalaikaṃ purandara ||
mayā dattaphalaṃ tv ekaṃ kim anyad dātum icchasi|
evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve puraskṛtya janārdanam ||
indraḥ sūryaḥ śaśī caiva gandharvo vānaras tathā|
gāyatrī vedamātā ca sāvitrī ca surūpiṇī ||
śrutiḥ smṛtiś ca nītiś ca dharmaśāstraṃ samūrtimat|
gāṃ ca arghaṃ ca dattvaivam āsyatām iti cābravīt ||
sādhu bho vipula śreṣṭha sādhu bho vipulaṃ tapaḥ ||
sādhu bho vipulaprājña sādhu bho vipulaśriya|
ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyāśvinau marut tathā|
bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathotsāhaṃ mama loke yathāsukham ||
iti śrutvā vacas tasya vipulo vipulekṣaṇaḥ|
praṇamya śirasā bhūmau praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ|
smṛtibhraṃśaś ca me jāto buddhir jātāndhacetanā|
mūḍho 'haṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ staumi jñānātītaṃ parāt param ||
tubhyaṃ trailokyabandho bhava mama śaraṇaṃ trāhi saṃsāraghorāt
bhīto 'haṃ garbhavāsāj jaramaraṇabhayāt trāhi māṃ mohabandhāt|
nityaṃ rogādhivāsam aniyatavapuṣaṃ trāhi māṃ kālapāśāt
śrutvaivovāca brahmā vipulamati punar mānayitvā yathāvat
āhūta samplavan te bhaviṣyasi tava me janmalobho na bhūyaḥ|
garbhāvāsan na ca tvan na ca punamaraṇaṃ kleśam āyāsapūrṇam
chittvā mohāndhaśatruṃ vrajasi ca paramaṃ brahmabhūyatvam eṣi ||
brahmaṇā evam uktas tu viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā|
evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathovāca pitāmahaḥ ||
indreṇa raviṇā caiva somena ca punaḥ punaḥ|
kiṃ na kurvanti manujāḥ sukhopāyaṃ mahat phalam ||
svaśarīre sthitaṃ tīrthaṃ śruto vistarato mayā ||
kimarthaṃ bhagavan brūhi sukhopāyaṃ mahat phalam|
adya pṛṣṭena kathitaṃ gopitaṃ ṛṣi sundari|
dhanyā evaṃ cariṣyanti adhanyā na ramanti tam ||
triguṇena tu bandhena baddhā pāśadṛḍhena tu|
prākṛtaṃ vaikṛtaṃ caiva dakṣiṇābandham eva ca|
etenaiva tu bandhena baddhāḥ varṇāśramāḥ sadā ||
snehād ākṛṣya manasāṃ bandhaḥ prākṛta ucyate ||
yogayuktena manasā yad yad aiśvaryam āpyate|
tac ca vaikṛtabandhas tu yadi tatrānurajyate ||
mokṣitaṃ na ca śaknoti itaś cetaś ca dhāvati ||
bhramante cakrayantreva ? yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati ||
garbhotpattiḥ kathaṃ deva yogī labhati kīdṛśīm|
kīdṛśaṃ labhate garbhaḥ śrotuṃ naḥ pratyudīryatām ||
parjanyād annam utpattir annād bhūtāni jajñire|
majjāyās tu bhavec chukraṃ naraḥ śukrasamudbhavaḥ|
māsī māsī ṛtuḥ strīṇāṃ bhavatīha na saṃśayaḥ|
pumān śukrādhiko jñeyaḥ kanyā raktādhikā bhavet|
samaśukre ca rakte ca sa ca jāyen napuṃsakaḥ ||
dviyamā triyamā caiva kathaṃ jāyeta gurviṇī|
kathaṃ strīdviyamā jāyet kathaṃ vā puruṣadvayam ||
vāyunā ca dvidhā bhinnā kanyakadviyamā smṛtā ||
śukrādhikās tu puruṣa dvidhā bhinnānilena tu|
dviyamā puruṣo jñeyā triyamās tu tridhā kṛte ||
ṛtusnātā yadā nārī yadi garbhādi gṛhyati|
prathame ca dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca sa jīvati ||
sameṣu janayet putraḥ kanyakā viṣame dine|
ṣaṣṭyāṣṭamau ca daśamī dvādaśī ca pumān bhavet ||
samarakte ca śukre ca śyāmaḥ saṃjāyate pumān ||
striyāḥ dhardiḥ praśekaś ca daurbalyaṃ copajāyate ||
tasyā hi hṛdayaṃ nārī yadi bhakṣyati kiṃcana|
bhakṣyaṃ lohyaṃ tathā peyam upabhogās tathāyayat ||
yad yad ākāṃkṣate kiṃcit tat tad āsyai pradāpayet ||
nāyā saṃkārayec cāsyā na caivam avamānayet|
śarīraś ca śriyā jaṣṭuṃ pīnoruśroṇi vakṣasam|
saptarātraṃ nava prāpya jāyate hṛdi pañjaram ||
daśame saptarātre ca pādau jāyate cobhau|
unaviṃśatisaptāhe jāyate ca tvag eva ca ||
tataḥ praviśate dehe nidrāsvapna yathā tathā ||
nopalabhyati sūkṣmatvād araṇy agnir yathā tathā|
mṛtaś cāhaṃ punarjāto bhūyaś caiva punarmṛtaḥ ||
sāmprataṃ ca punar garbhaḥ kleśaḥ prāptaḥ suduḥsahaḥ|
yatra janmajarā nāsti yatra mṛtyuś ca nāsti vai ||
yatra brahma paraṃ vedyaṃ cariṣyāmi yatavrataḥ|
evam ādīny anekāni cintayitvā punaḥ punaḥ ||
yāvat tiṣṭhati garbhastho jāti smarati pūrvikām|
atigauro 'tikṛṣṇaś ca naro bhavati kiṃ prabho ||
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī śete saṃkucitā sadā|
kujo vā vāmano vāpi paṅgavaḥ sthūlaśiraḥ katham ||
āsavaś ca parikliṣṭā ye cānye kaṭutiktakāḥ ||
tīkṣṇaṃ tu sevamānā yā jātyandho jāyate sutaḥ|
yadā garbhāśaye raktaṃ striyāḥ pūrvaṃ niṣicyate ||
tatra yo jāyate garbhabhiruḥ krandanako bhavet|
vātaḥ prakupitas tasyā garbham ātuhya tiṣṭhati ||
kubjas tu jāyate tasmād garbhād vātanipīḍanāt|
tasyā saṃhanyate garbho vāmanas tena jāyate|
tataḥ sthūlaśirās tena pumān jāyaty asaṃśayaḥ ||
vikṛtākṣas tv anakṣo vā bhavadrasvagudaḥ katham ||
karālas tena doṣeṇa jāyate mānavas tathā|
tasmād anena doṣeṇa karālo jāyate pumān ||
śukro dāvartanī cāpi paṅgū janayate sutam ||
mūkaṃ janayate bālaṃ dauhṛdaś ca vimānitā ||
gṛhītagarbhā yā nārī visṛjet - māsa māsikam|
atha grastā yadā nārī vāto dāvartapīḍitā|
agudo jāyate tasmāj jātaś cāpi na jīvati ||
hīnāṅgo jāyate kasmād adhikāṅgo 'pi vā katham|
kathaṃ vā jāyate putraḥ kanyakā kena jāyate|
apumān kena jāyeta dviyamā triyamā tathā ||
śukrādhikaḥ pumān jñeyaḥ kanyā raktādhikā bhavet|
piṇḍībhūto yadā garbha mārutau vibhaved dvidhā|
evaṃ te dviyamā jñeyās triyamā ca tridhā kṛte ||
śoṇitaṃ māṃsa medaś ca asthi majjā ca pañcamī|
tasyotpattiś ca sthānaṃ ca jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ|
manaḥ śukrasya prabhavaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śrotraṃ tathākṣiṇī|
yathā niṣiktaṃ kṣīraṃ tu payasād dadhi jāyate|
evaṃ śarīra nirgaccet - śukraṃ śukravahā śirāḥ|
tatas tu tāḥ śukravahā meḍhranābhīm anusṛtāḥ|
nāśukraṃ tat tu siñcanti tasmād garbhasya sambhavaḥ ||
kathaṃ vedayate jāti kathaṃ jātismaro bhavet|
etasmin saṃśayaṃ me 'dya chettum arhasi śaṅkara ||
bhāvitātmāṃ ca yo jantur devi bhogādhikaṃ ca yat|
brahmavid jñānasaṃyuktaḥ sa jātiṃ smarate pumān ||
etat kathaya deveśa rahaḥ kāle maheśvara ||
nidrāsvedaṃ ca tandrā ca muhūrtam upajāyate ||
na cārdravaṃvai dṛśyeta śukrasya rajaso 'pi vā|
kanyakā kena liṅgena jñāyate kathayasva me ||
pādorujaṅghapārśvaś ca dakṣiṇaṃ yadi hy unnataḥ|
dakṣiṇaṃ vipulaṃ tatra tadā putraḥ prajāyate ||
vāmaś caiva yadā paśyet tadā jāyeta kanyakā|
unnataṃ madhyamasthāś ca tadā jāyet - napuṃsakam ||
kathaṃ strīṇāṃ na jāyeta romāṇi khalitaṃ tathā ||
tathā vṛṣaṇagā jantor yasya retovahā śiraḥ|
nibaddhā mastake tālu kapolās tu samāśritāḥ ||
śirā śukravahā strīṇāṃ na śūnyasyānna jāyate|
yātmāpālo ca kās tv agni dṛṣṭimaṇḍalasaṃśritaḥ ? ||
nibaddhanty akṣipakṣmāṇi tena romāṇi ca bhruvoḥ ||
striyās tanyaś ca śukraś ca yac ca śvetaṃ tathākṣiṣu ||
brūhi brūhi viśālākṣi yady asti tava saṃśayaḥ ||
jīvabhūteti yat proktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavet|
sthānam asya na jānāmi rūpaṃ varṇaṃ ca īśvara ||
na cānyad eva paśyāmi jīvanirṇaya kīrtaya ||
jīvasya lakṣaṇaṃ devi kathituṃ kena śakyate|
na rūpavarṇaṃ jīvasya vidyate sthānam eva ca ||
vyāpi sarvagataṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvam āśritya tiṣṭhati|
tadvaj jīvo na paśyeta śarīrastho 'pi sundari ||
dadhivac ca yathā sarpir dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate|
tadvaj jīvaḥ śarīrastho dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate ||
vyāpīti kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ jīvaḥ sarvagato 'pi ca|
taṃ vṛthā kathito 'sy adya mriyate kena hetunā ||
na jīvo mriyate devi sarveṣāṃ surasundari|
bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraś cara eva saḥ ||
kathito 'smi samāsena kim anyac chrotum icchasi ||
śrotum icchāmi deveśa mānuṣāṇāṃ hitaṃ vada ||
devatānāṃ hariḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhā gaṅgā nadīṣu ca|
kṣomaṃ vastreṣu ca śreṣṭhaṃ yaśaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ vibhūṣaṇam|
dāneṣu cābhayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ manaḥ śreṣṭhendriyeṣu ca|
vidyā saṃgrahaṣu śreṣṭhā satyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vacaḥsu ca ||
āyudhānāṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ bāndhaveṣu ca mātaraḥ|
akāraś cākṣaraḥ śreṣṭho dharmaśreṣṭho hy ahiṃsakaḥ|
paśuṣu saurabhī śreṣṭhā nareṣu ca narādhipaḥ ||
māsi mārgaśiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ kṛtaḥ śreṣṭhaś caturyuge|
vasanta ṛtuṣu śreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ cāyanam uttaram ||
strīṣu lakṣmīr dhṛtiḥ śreṣṭhā vasuśreṣṭho hutāśanaḥ ||
nakṣatreṣv abhijit śreṣṭhaḥ kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaleṣu ca ||
vedeṣu ca varaṃ sāma sthāvareṣu himālayaḥ|
aśvattho vaṭa vṛkṣeṣu bhūteṣu vara cetanaḥ ||
adhyātma sarvavidyāsu vākya satya vara smṛtaḥ|
marīcir vara vāteṣu hariḥ śreṣṭho mṛgeṣu ca|
sādhya nārāyaṇaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca pitāmahaḥ ||
sarvasāraṃ samuddhṛtya kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy aham ||
yaṃ viditvā na paśyanti janāḥ saṃsārabandhanam ||
brahmahā gurutalpī vā surāpasteya eva vā|
athavā saṃkare jātas tat sarvam apanodati ||
na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavigrahaḥ|
yathā vai sarvadhātūnāṃ doṣā dahyanti dhāmyatām|
tathā pāpāḥ pradahyante dhruvaṃ prāṇasya nigrahāt ||
yajñena devān āpnoti rājyaṃ vai tapasaḥ phalam|
saṃnyāsād brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ vairāgyāt prakṛtau layam ||
jñānāt prāpnoti kaivalyaṃ paraṃ brahma sanātanam|
ity etā gatayaḥ pañca vidhivat parikīrtitāḥ ||
muhūrtārdhaṃ muhūrtaṃ vā yogaṃ yuñjīta yogavit|
yuñjāno 'pi prayatnena yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati|
brahmaloke dhruvaṃ vāso viṣṇuloke ca sundari ||
kṣīṇapuṇyas tato martye jāyate vipule kule ||
yogasya vidhim icchāmi śrotuṃ me puruṣottama|
padmakaṃ svastikaṃ caiva niṣkalam añjalis tathā|
ardhacandraṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca paryaṅkaṃ bhadram eva ca ||
pratyāhāras tathā dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmaś ca dhāraṇā|
tarkaś caiva samādhiś ca ṣaḍaṅgo yoga ucyate ||
manasākarṣayed yas tu pratyāhāraḥ sa ucyate ||
ātmā dhyātā mano dhyānaṃ dhyeyaḥ śuddhaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ|
yat paraṃ paramaiśvaryam ekaṃ tatra prayojanam ||
tālaśabdās tu nirvāṇaṃ daśa dve ca prakīrtitaḥ|
prāṇāyāmān na saṃdeho dviguṇā dhāraṇā smṛtā ||
yoge tu triguṇā proktā saṃkrame ca caturguṇā|
mānaso yaugapadyaś ca dvirūpo yoga ucyate ||
dhyāyeta paramaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sa yogo mānasaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
saṃyamya manasā prāṇaṃ prāṇāyāmān manas tathā|
evaṃ dhyāyet paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ yaugapadyaḥ sa ucyate ||
tāḍitaṃ na ca vindeta yadā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ ||
śītoṣṇaṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ ca tṛṣṇābhukṣaṃ tathaiva ca|
vedanāṃ naiva jānāti yogasiddhas tu sundari ||
eṣa yogavidhir devi tava pṛṣṭena sundari|
kathito 'smi samāsena kim anyat kathayāmy aham ||
sadāśivas tu niśvāsa ūrdhvaśvāsaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ|
tayor madhye tu vijñeyaḥ paramātmā śivo 'vyayaḥ ||
dhyānayogaṃ na tasyāsti karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate|
jñānam anyat pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi nibodha me|
śāstrapañcasu yat proktaṃ śṛṇu saṃkṣepa nirṇayam|
sāṃkhye yoge pañcarātre śaive vede ca nirmitam ||
ādāv eva manaḥ śanair uparamet kṛtvā ca vaśyendriyaṃ
yāvat tal layatāṃ vrajeta manasā niḥsaṃjñadehas tathā|
kiṃ tac chāstrasahasrakoṭipaṭhitaṃ sāraṃ na yo 'nviṣyati ||
cittaṃ yasya parikṣayo yadi bhavet tiṣṭhet tanutvaṃ yathā|
taj jñeyaṃ gatim uttamaṃ śivapadaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhacchidaṃ
vedānteṣu ca niṣṭha eṣa kathitaḥ kiṃ śāstram anyad viśet ||
bhittvā yat tāludeśe mukham uparigataṃ tāludeśena mūrdhni
! mūrdhni dvārāntareṇa śivaparamapadaṃ yānti yogena yuktāḥ ||
kartā kāraṇam avyayo 'vyayam asau vyāpī vibhaktāvidam
nādas tasya sadā sadā nadati taṃ nādopariṣṭhā haraḥ ||
bhittvā granthiṃ sapāśaṃ viṣam iva viṣayaṃ tyaktasaṅgaikabhāvāḥ
paśyanty ete tam īśaṃ guṇakalarahitaṃ nirvikāraṃ prakāśam ||
tuṣṭāsmi deva mama saṃśayam adya naṣṭam
adyāpi tṛptir iha nāsti mamāpi śambho ||
pṛthagdānasya icchāmi śrotuṃ māṃ dātum arhasi|
cyutaś ca martye sa bhaved dhanāḍhyaḥ
dharmo hi tasya na ca nirmalo 'sti|
vastraṃ tu bhūyo na ca mānalābhaḥ
cyutaṃ ca martye sa bhaven narendraḥ|
rakṣeśo 'pi bibhīṣaṇas tv amaratāṃ prāptas tapasyaiva tu
śūdraṃ hi śilpaṃ tapa āha indraḥ ||
kiṃ praśasyaṃ mahādeva tattvaṃ vaktum ihārhasi ||
hariṇā ca śiro bhitvā dattaṃ me rudhiraṃ purā ||
akṣayaṃ valamūrjaṃ ca ajarāmaram eva ca|
mamādhikaṃ bhaved viṣṇur māma yitvam vijeṣyasi ||
bhuktvā lokān kramāt sarvān śivaloke pratiṣṭhitaḥ ||
ihaiva sa yālaṃ bhoktā devarājyam avāpsyati ||
etat sarvaṃ yadā dānaṃ tad dānam uttamottamam ||
bhūtānām anukampayā yadi dhanaṃ dātā sadānvarṣine|
yady eva kurute sadārtiharaṇaṃ śraddhānvitau bhaktimān|
tasyānantayālaṃ vadanti vibudhāṃs sa yasya sandarśanāt ||
punaś ca te martyam upāgatāś ca
tatas sa tasmāc cyutim āpya lokā
cihnaṃ ca lokaṃ ca samāsato me|
cihnaṃ ca karmaṃ ca vipākatāṃ ca ||
hatvā ca vipraṃ manasā ca vācā
pītvā ca madyaṃ dvijaḥ ? kāmato vā
yāvac ca kalpaṃ daśa atra bhuktvā ||
yaḥ kūṭasākṣī sa ca khalv alā?au|
yaḥ strī haret so 'pi jitaḥ striyā syāt|
hṛtvā tu gāvaḥ sa bhavet daridraḥ|
hṛtvā ca bījaṃ sa bhaved abījaḥ ||
hṛtvā ca sūcīn tu bhavet sa daṃśaḥ
māṃsaṃ tu hṛtvā sa bhaveta gṛdhraḥ
kṣaumaṃ ca hṛtvā sa ca durbalatvam ||
nityaṃ yena vinā na yāti divasaṃ pañcatvam āpadyate
bandhuḥ sarvanivartate gatadayā dharmaika tatra sthitaḥ
tasmād dharmaparo na cānyaḥ suhṛdaḥ sevet paratrārthinaḥ ||
sukhena labhate svargaṃ karmaṇā yena tac chṛṇu ||
lokānaṃ mātaro gāvo gobhiḥ sarvaṃ jagad dhṛtam|
kaṇḍūyanaṃ ca kartavyaṃ yathāsaukhyaṃ bhaved gavām ||
sāgarāntā mahī sarvā n pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhavet ||
pṛṣṭasaṃsparśanād yañ ca śraddhayā yadi mānavaḥ|
lāṅgūlenoddhṛtaṃ toyaṃ mūrddhnā gṛhṇāti yo naraḥ|
yāvaj jīva kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ naśyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ||
vidhivat snāpayed gāṃś ca mantrayuktena vāriṇā|
vyādhivighnam alakṣmītvaṃ naśyate sadya eva ca|
mṛtāpatyāś ca gāvāś ca snānam eva praśasyate ||
gavāṃ śṛṅgodakaṃ gṛhya mūrdhni yo dhārayen naraḥ|
catvāraḥ stanadhārās tu yas tu mūrdhnā pratīcchati|
gavārthaṃ yas tyajet prāṇān gograheṣu dvijottama|
tatphalaṃ labhate martyaḥ śivalokaṃ ca gacchati|
devāḥ r aṣṭavidhāḥ proktāḥ tiryak pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ|
mānuṣyam ekam evāhuś cāturvarṇyaḥ kathaṃ bhavet ||
evaṃ varṇā dvijaś cāsīt sarvakalpāgram agrataḥ ||
ṛtvajatve sthitāḥ kecit kecit saṃrakṣaṇe sthitāḥ|
āgatā ṛṣayaḥ sarve devatāḥ pitaras tathā|
rakṣaṇārtaṃ tu ye viprāḥ kalpitāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ|
te tu vaiśyatvam āyāntu vārto āpaṇatodbhavāḥ|
kalpitā ye dvijātīnāṃ sarve śūdrā bhavantu te|
kīrtitāni samāsena kim anyac chrotum icchasi ||
kiṃ tapaḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ vṛttir vāpi tapodhana|
yajñāś caiva pṛthaktvena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ ||
brāhmaṇasya tapo yajñāḥ - tapaḥ kṣātrasya rakṣaṇam|
vaiśyaś ca tapa vāṇijya tapaḥ śūdrasya sevanam ||
pratigraha dhano vipraḥ kṣatriyasya dhanur dhanam|
kṛṣir dhanaṃ tathā vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ dhanam ||
ārambhayajñaḥ kṣatrasya havir yajño viśas tathā|
satya tīrtha dvijātīnāṃ raṇa tīrthaṃ tu kṣatriyāḥ|
āryā tīrthaṃ tu vaiśānāṃ ! śūdratīrthaṃ tu vai dvijāḥ ||
nāsti vidyāsamo mitro nāsti dānasamaḥ sakhā|
nāsti jñānasamo bandur nāsti yajño japaḥ samaḥ ||
dāna yajñas tapas tīrthaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ yoga eva ca|
eteṣu katamaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śrotum icchāmi kīrtaya ||
saṃnyāsīnāṃ sahasrebhyaḥ śreṣṭho yac ya jitendriyaḥ|
kathayasva mamādya tvaṃ chettum arhasi saṃśayam ||
carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ tatra śreṣṭho - carāḥ smṛtāḥ|
carāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ buddhimān śreṣṭha ucyate ||
buddhimānṣu ! ca sarveṣu tataḥ śreṣṭha narāḥ smṛtāḥ|
narāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate ||
vidvarsv api ca sarveṣu kṛtabuddhir viśiṣyate|
kṛtabuddhiṣu sarveṣu śreṣṭhaḥ kartā sa ucyate ||
kartṛṣv api ca sarveṣu brahmavedī viśiṣyate|
brahmavedi paraṃ ! vipraḥ nānyaṃ vedmi paraṃtapaḥ|
sa vipraḥ sa tapasvī ca sa yogī sa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
pañcaviṃśati yat tattvaṃ jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ|
kathayasva mamādya tvaṃ chidyate yena saṃśayaḥ ||
nādimadhyaṃ na cāntaṃ ca yan na vedyaṃ surair api|
sarvaḥ sarvagato vyāpī sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ||
jalapakṣī yathā toyair na lipyeta jale caran|
tadvad doṣair na lipyeta pāpakarmaśatair api ||
caturviṃśati yat tattvaṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi niścayam|
vikṛtiś ca sa vijñeyas tattvataḥ sa manīṣibhiḥ ||
vikṛtiṃ pratilīyante bhūmyādi kramaśas tu vai ||
ekaviṃśati yat tattvaṃ suṣiraṃ viddhi bho dvija|
saptasvarās trayo grāmā mūrchanās tv ekaviṃśatiḥ|
ākāśadhātu viprendra śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te daśa|
hṛdiṃ ca daśamaṃ jñeyaṃ deha ākāśasambhavaḥ|
punar anyat pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇuṣva dvijottama ||
daśa dhātuguṇā jñeyāḥ pañcabhūtaḥ pṛthak pṛthak|
ākāśasya guṇāḥ śabdo vyāpitvaṃ chidratāpi ca ||
śabda pūrvaṃ mayākhyātaṃ śṛṇu sparśaṃ dvijottama|
karkaśaḥ paruṣas tīkṣṇaḥ śītoṣṇa daśa ca dvayam|
prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca|
nāga udghāṭanaṃ puṣyaṃ karoti satataṃ dvija ||
prāṇaḥ śvasati bhūtānāṃ niśvasanti ca nityaśaḥ|
prayāṇaṃ kurute yasmāt tasmāt prāṇa iti smṛtaḥ ||
apanayaty apānas tu āhāraṃ manujām adhaḥ|
samaṃ nayati gātreṣu samāno nāma mārutaḥ ||
balaṃ śīghraṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca ceṣṭā karmātmanā bhavaḥ ||
vāyunāpi sṛjas tejas tadrūpaṃ guṇam ucyate|
śabdaḥ sparśaḥ purā proktaḥ śṛṇu rūpaguṇaṃ tataḥ|
hrasvaṃ dīrgham aṇu sthūlaṃ vṛttamaṇḍalam eva ca ||
caturasraṃ dvirasraṃ ca tryasraṃ caiva ṣaḍasrakam|
śuklaḥ kṛṣṇas tathā rakto nīlaḥ pīto 'ruṇas tathā ||
śyāmaḥ piṅgala babhruś ca nava raṅgāḥ prakīrtitāḥ|
kāmas tejo kṣaṇaḥ krodho jaṭharāgniś ca pañcamaḥ ||
jñānaṃ yogas tapo dhyānaṃ viśvāgnir daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ|
śaucaṃ rāgo laghus taikṣṇyaṃ daśamaṃ cordhvabhāgitā ||
caturguṇāḥ smṛtā āpaḥ vijñeyā ca manīṣibhiḥ ||
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś ca sa caturguṇaḥ|
madhuraś ca rasān ṣaḍ vai pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ||
āpadhātu daśa tv anyān śṛṇu kīrtayato mama ||
lālā siṅghāṇikā śleṣmā raktaḥ pittaḥ kaphas tathā|
svedam aśru rasaś caiva medaś ca daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
daśa āpaguṇāś cānye kīrtayiṣyāmi tān śṛṇu|
adbhya śaityaṃ rasa kledo dravatvaṃ snehasaumyatā ||
āpaś cāpy asṛjad bhūmis tasyā gandhaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ ||
karpūraḥ kasturīkaṃ ca candanāgarum eva ca|
bhūmer dhātu daśa tv anyān kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu|
tvacaṃ māṃsaṃ ca medaṃ ca snāyu majjā sirā tathā ||
nakhadantaruhāś caiva keśaś ca daśamas tathā|
daśa tv anyān pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu bhūmiguṇān dvija ||
bhūmeḥ sthairyaṃ rajastvaṃ ca kāṭhinyaṃ prasavātmakam|
gandho guruś ca śaktiś ca nīhārasthāpanākṛtiḥ ||
yathā śrutaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ kīrtitaṃ nikhilena tu ||
śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī ||
hastapādas tathā pāyur upastho vāk ca pañcamaḥ ||
śrotreṇa gṛhyate śabdo vividhas tu dvijottama|
cakṣuṣā gṛhyate rūpaṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca ||
māhendraṃ vāruṇaṃ caiva vāyavyāgneyam eva ca ||
kāyaśaucaṃ ca kurute tṛṣānāśanam eva ca ||
navamāni hy anekāni vāruṇaṃ karma ucyate|
pādābhyāṃ gamanaṃ karma diśaś ca vidiśas tathā ||
vācā tu kurute karma navadhā dvijapuṅgava|
stutinindā praśaṃsā ca ākrośaḥ priya eva saḥ ||
praśno 'nujñā tathākhyānam āśīś ca vidhayo nava|
etā navavidhā vāṇī kīrtito me dvijottama ||
adhunā kathayiṣyāmi manaso nava vai guṇān|
sad asac cāśutā caiva manaso nava vai guṇāḥ ||
manaso dvividhaṃ rūpaṃ manaś conmana eva ca ||
nigṛhītā visṛṣtaṃ ca bandhamokṣau tu sādhanam ||
sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ caiva mana eva vidur budhāḥ|
manaḥ svavedyaṃ lokānām unmanas tu na vidyate|
na śabdaṃ śṛṇute śrotraṃ śaṅkhabherīsvanād api ||
tvacaḥ sparśaṃ na jānāti śītoṣṇam api duḥsaham|
rūpaṃ paśyati no cakṣuḥ parvatābhyadhiko 'pi vā ||
jihvā rasaṃ na vindeta madhurāmlavato 'pi vā|
gandhaṃ jighrati na ghrāṇā tīkṣṇaṃ vāpy aśucīny api ||
sa śivaḥ sa paro brahmā sa viṣṇuḥ sa paro 'kṣaraḥ|
sa sūkṣmaḥ sa paro haṃsaḥ so 'kṣaraḥ kṣaravarjitaḥ ||
eṣa unmana jānīhi śivaś ca dvijapuṅgava|
aho matimatāṃ śreṣṭha aho dharmabhṛtāṃ vara|
aho dama śamaḥ satya aho yajña aho tapaḥ ||
kiṃ dadāmi varaṃ brūhi dātāsmi tava cepsitam|
etac chrutvā tatas tena pratyuvāca śubhāṃ giram ||
athavā bhagavān viṣṇur mama jijñāsur āgataḥ ||
rūpaṃ darśaya govinda yady asti tapasaḥ phalam ||
tatas tu puṇḍarīkākṣo darśayāmāsa svāṃ tanum|

app.lem: tatas tu puṇḍarīkākṣo darśayāmāsa svāṃ tanum

lg.l: anarthayajñas taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ|
adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ ||
stotreṇānena me tāta tuṣṭo 'smi bhṛśam ejitaḥ|
durlabhāny api trailokye dadāmi varam īpsitam ||
tvaṃ cāpi me brūhi varaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ
evam uktvā haris tatra kare gṛhya tapodhanam|
tataḥ so 'ntarhitas tatra tenaiva saha keśavaḥ ||
śeṣaṃ bhūtacaturvidhasya niyataṃ jīvasya kiṃ śocyate
tasmān nāsti jagatsusāravimalaṃ muktvā śivaṃ śāśvatam ||
varṇagotrāśramaṃ tasmāc chrotum icchāmi te punaḥ ||
ajitā nāma tat pūrvaṃ kāmakrodhajitena tu|
saṃkalpas tasya rājendra kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu ||
niyamān daśa saṃśritya daśa vāyava ṛtvijaḥ ||
vinārthaṃ yajñam iṣṭvā tu kālaṃ ca kṣapayaty asau|
daśayajñam ahaṃ śrotuṃ dehi māṃ dvijasattama|
japo yogas tapo dhyānaṃ svādhyāyaś ca daśa smṛtaḥ ||
māna bhoga daśa rājan daśakāma udāhṛtaḥ ||
mānaso yaugapadyaś ca saṃkṣiptaś ca viśāmpate|
viśālā nāma yogaś ca tato dvikaraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
raviḥ somo hutāśaś ca sphaṭikāmbaram eva ca|
anirodhamanāḥ sūkṣmaṃ dhyāyed yogaḥ sa mānasaḥ|
prāṇāyāmair mano ruddhvā yaugapadyaḥ sa ucyate ||
saṃkṣipta eṣa ākhyāto viśālāṃ chṛṇu tattvataḥ|
saṃkṣiptāṃ ca viśālāṃ ca cintayīta parasparam|
eṣā dvikaraṇī nāma yogasya vidhir ucyate ||
dehamadhye hṛdi jñeyaṃ hṛdimadhye tu paṅkajam|
paṅkajasya ca madhye tu karṇikāṃ viddhi gopate ||
karṇikāyās tu madhye tu pañcabinduṃ vidur budhāḥ|
tasya madhye 'mbaraṃ dhyāyet susūkṣmaṃ śivam avyayam ||
daśayogam idaṃ rājan kathitaṃ ca mayā tava|
daśadhyānaṃ samāsena kīrtitaṃ śṛṇu tad yathā ||
candrā mano'nugā caiva sukṛtā ca tathāparā ||
saumyā nirañjanā caiva nirālambā ca kīrtitā|
tat tad akṣaram ākarṇya amṛtatvāya kalpyate|
piṅgalāṃ tu śikhādhūmāṃ dhyāyen nityam atandritaḥ ||
dhyāyen mano'nugā nāma pakṣmīr āpīḍya locane ||
śvetapītāruṇaṃ binduṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo na jāyate|
mano'nugādi ṣaṭ tv ete dhyānam uktaṃ mayā tava ||
lakṣaṇaṃ tasya rājendra śṛṇu vakṣyāmi sāmpratam ||
tena yo 'bhyasate nityaṃ sa yogī bhuvaneśvaraḥ ||
ya idaṃ dhyāyate nityam uttamāṃ gatim āpnuyāt ||
na sa muhyati taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyusambhava bhūpate ||
tena sarvamakhair iṣṭaṃ tena taptaṃ tapas tathā ||
pañca pañca cavarge tu vāyubījam adhaḥsthitam ||
yādṛśaṃ pañcame proktaṃ saptame ca prayojayet|
mucyate so 'pi saṃsāre saṃśayo nāsti bhūpate ||
ācārāl labhatīha āyur atulam akṣapyavittaṃ tathā
ācārāt sutam īpsitaṃ ca labhate śrīkīrtiprajñāyaśaḥ|
ācārāl labhate ca lakṣmim atulāṃ khyātiṃ tathaivottamām
ācārāt kativaṃśa kīrtaya punas tṛptir na me jāyate|
sarvajñaḥ tvam ahaṃ śṛṇomi varadaṃ kiñcin na me śāśvatam
śasye bhasmani govraje dvija jalaṃ kuryān na cārkaṃ naraḥ ||
pādenāgnijalaṃ spṛśen na ca guruṃ pādena pādaṃ tathā
śaucaṃ kārya jalādinā ca niyataṃ nādho jalaṃ kārayet|
strīṇāṃ kiṃ priyam asti tad vada vibho saṃsārasārastriyām
kiṃ sadbhāva na vedmi tasya viṣaye kiṃ dveṣya kiṃ tātpriyam|
paśyāmi na ca tasya garbhakalayā prāpnoti niḥsaṃśayam
rājan kiṃ priyam asti arthaparataḥ paśyāmi nānyan nṛpe
māyā vāpi karoti sadya manujātyaktānya vā sevate ||
strīhetor api candramāstribhuvane dhiktāṃ gataś cāmaro
daṇḍakṣo hatarāṣṭrapaurasahitaḥ kiṃ bhūya vakṣyāmy aham ||
vipre kīdṛśalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati bho kīdṛg muniś cocyate
tenārthena bhaveta bhikṣu bhagavan nigranthi ko vā dvija|
kenārthena bhaved dvijendra bhagavan jñeyaḥ parivrājakaḥ
! jñeyāḥ kim ṛṣayaś ca lakṣaṇa muner icchāmi jñātuṃ punaḥ ||
satyaṃ śaucam ahiṃsatā damaśamau bhūtānukampī sadā
evaṃ yaḥ kurute dvijātisuvaraḥ śūdro 'pi yaḥ saṃyamī ||
yat tat sthānaparaṃ vrajanti puruṣāḥ tasmāt parivrājakaḥ|
granthidārasutaṃ dhanaṃś ca virati nirgranthika socyate
ramyante ṛṣir āśrame dhṛtimanas tasmād ṛṣiḥ socyate ||
sarvaṃ tat kathito 'si lakṣaṇa mayā sandhiśvanirnāśanam
etaj jñānaparaṃ prabodham atulaṃ nityaṃ śivaṃ dhāryate ||
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca uttarāraṇim eva ca|
vidviṣanti ca te 'nyonyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya kīrtaya ||
hetunā tena rājendra anyonyaṃ vidviṣanti te|
satyaṃ śaucam ahiṃsatā damaśamo nirmānam īrṣyāruṣā|
yogābhyāsaratir divaukasagaṇe jñāne ca sāṃkhye tathā
etācāra sadā narendra vibudhāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ kīrtitāḥ
daityānāṃ śṛṇu kīrtaye svavahito 'sambhāvya teṣāṃ nijam ||
nidrā nitya divā prasaktam aśuciḥ sūryodaye supyate
devabrāhmaṇa vidviṣanti satataṃ lobhāc ca kāryakriyā
dharmaṃ dūṣayate ca mūḍhamanasā āryaṃ ca tīrthaṃ tathā|
hantavyāny ahatāś ca manyabahavo visphūrjitam adruvan
daityānāṃ kathitaṃ ca cihna katicit sadbhāvataḥ kīrtitam ||
martyeṣv eva narendra mānuṣam abhūd devāsurāṇāṃ nṛpaḥ
yo yaṃ proktaḥ svabhāvatām ubhayato mānuṣyaloke tathā|
yan me pṛcchitavān narendra kathitaṃ yat tvaṃ purā gopitam
vidveṣobhayakāraṇaṃ narapate kiṃ bhūya vakṣyāmy aham ||
asti kautūhalaṃ cānyaṃ pṛcchāmi tvāṃ dvijottama|
rātrau prajāyate kasmād divā kasmān na jāyate|
kasmāc ca kurute jantor nidrā netrapramīlanam|
etan me saṃśayaṃ chindhi sarvajño 'si dvijottama ||
devī hy eṣā mahābhāgā nidrā netrāśrayā nṛṇām|
guhyakāś ca mṛgā nāgā kiṃnarā jalajoragāḥ|
jāyate vigrahe tv eṣā kṛte hy amṛtamanthane|
rajas tamaś cāsuraṃ vai sattvaṃ devakṛtaiḥ śubhaiḥ ||
tasyāḥ prabhāvābhihatā dudruvas te diśo daśa ||
tatra pītāmbaradharo viṣṇur ekas tu tiṣṭhati|
dehi deva mamāvāsaṃ yatrāhaṃ nivase sukham ||
tato nārāyaṇas tuṣṭas tāṃ devīṃ pratyabhāṣata|
śarīre mama vastavyaṃ viṣṇur enām athābravīt ||
tatas tāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ pāpmanā samatiṣṭhata|
tataḥ śete sa vaikuṇṭhaḥ pāpmanā tv abhilaṅghitaḥ ||
ūcus te paramodvignāḥ śayānaṃ viṣṇum acyutam ||
utthitaś ca viśālākṣaḥ pāpmanā tasya pṛṣṭhataḥ|
asmākaṃ vai śarīreṣu iyaṃ pāpmā viniḥsṛtā ||
viśrutāṃ triṣu lokeṣu tāṃ pūjayatha māṃ yathā ||
vibhaktā vaiṣṇavī pāpmā teṣu sarveṣu devatā ||
parvateṣv atha vṛkṣeṣu sāgareṣu saritsu ca|
eṣotpattiś ca nidrāyā yathā vasati tac chṛṇu|
trīṇi sthānāni yasyā vai śarīreṣu śarīriṇām ||
tamaḥ śleṣmāśrayā nidrā rajonidrā tu vātikā ||
pittāśrayāṃ smṛtāṃ nidrāṃ sāttvikāṃ viddhi bhūpate|
nidrā divā na bhavati tasmāt sattvaguṇātmikā|
yasmāt somodbhavā nidrā tamāṃsi ca rajāṃsi ca ||
tasmād rātrau bhaven nidrā tāmasī harajātmikā|
rajas tamaś ca niyatas tadā nidrā pravartate|
tamaḥ pravartate jantos tatas tv akṣnor nimīlanam|
hṛdayaṃ muhyate cāpi tamasā cāvṛtaṃ manaḥ|
sparśaṃ na vedayaty eva na śṛṇoti na paśyati ||
eṣā nṛṇām antakarī nidrā vai tāmasī smṛtā ||
akarmaṇy apravṛttiś ca mṛtavat svapate kṣitau|
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca vaiṣamyāni śrutāni me|
kasmiṃścin narakaṃ jñeyaṃ pātālaṃ ca dvijottama ||
merumūrdhaṃ ca viprendra devālayaṃ nibodha mām ||
upariṣṭāt tu vijñeyāḥ pātālāḥ sapta eva tu|
ābhāsatālaḥ prathamaḥ svatālaś ca tataḥ param ||
śītalaś ca gabhastiś ca śarkaraś ca śilātalam|
baliś ca daityarājendro rākṣasaś ca viśaṃkhaṇaḥ|
agnīdhraś cāgnibāhuś ca medhā medhātithir vasuḥ|

app.lem: agnīdhraś cāgnibāhuś ca medhā medhātithir vasuḥ
app.rdg: agnīndhraś cāgnibāhuś ca medhā medhātithir vasuḥ

lg.l: jyotiṣmān dyutimān havyaḥ savanaḥ patra eva ca ||
agnibāhuś ca medhā ca patraś caiva trayo janāḥ|
lokapālāḥ sthitās tatra caturbhiś caturo diśaḥ ||
mahāvītaḥ smṛto varṣo dhātakī ca narādhipa|
tasya bāhyaḥ samudro 'bhūt svādūdaka iti smṛtaḥ ||
puṣkaradvīpam antaś ca kṣīrodo nāma sāgaraḥ ||
havyaputrāḥ smṛtāḥ sapta varṣanāma tathā smṛtaḥ ||
krauñcadvīpasamudrānte sapta varṣās tu te smṛtāḥ ||
muniś ca dundubhiś caiva sutā dyutimatas tu vai ||
tatrāpi saptavarṣe ca nāmataḥ śṛṇu bhārata ||
ṣaṣṭhaḥ prabhākaraś caiva kapilaḥ saptamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
śvetaś ca haritaś caiva jīmūto rohitas tathā|
vaidyuto mānasaś caiva suprabhaḥ saptamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
śāntaś ca śiśiraś caiva sukhadānanda eva ca|
śivakṣemo dhruvaś caiva sapta medhātitheḥ sutāḥ ||
siṃha barhiṇadvīpaṃ ca padmaś cakras tathaiva ca|
lāṅgalo vṛṣadvīpaś ca dvīpo bhadrākaras tathā|
candradvīpaś ca sindhuś ca candanadvīpa eva ca|
pañcamaṃ ramyakaṃ varṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ caiva hiraṇmayam|
kuravaḥ saptamo jñeyo bhadrāśvaś cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
nāgadvīpas tathā saumyo gāndharvaś cātha vāruṇaḥ|
merumūle tu rājendra jñeyo varṣa ilāvṛtaḥ ||
uttaraṇeṇa (uttareṇa?) tu nīlasya varṣa ramyaka ucyate|
tasya cottarapārśve tu varṣaḥ kuruvale smṛtaḥ ||
pūrvaṃ bhadrāśvato jñeyaḥ ketumālas tu paścime|
himaṃvān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadho nīla eva ca ||
śvetaś ca śṛṅgavantaś ca ṣaḍ ete varṣaparvatāḥ|
himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhaś ceti dakṣiṇa|
śvetaś caivatriśṛṅgaś ca nīlaś caiva tathottare ||
yamaḥ saṃyamanī nāma nityaṃ vasati bhūpate|
naiṛtir vasati nityaṃ ramye śuddhavatī pure ||
varuṇo bhogavatyāṃ tu vāyor gandhavatī purī|
bhadrāśvaṃ plāvayitvā tu vanāny upavanāni ca|
mero vai dakṣiṇe pārśve jambūvṛkṣaḥ sanātanaḥ|
tena nāmāṅkito rājan jambūdvīpa iti śrutam ||
tasmād bāhyaḥ samudro bhūd garbhādeti samudrarāṭ|
etad bhūrlokavistāro hy ata ūrdhva bhuvaḥ smṛtaḥ|
brahmalokaḥ smṛtaḥ satyaṃ viṣṇulokam ataḥ param ||
devyā saha mahābhāgo gaṇaiś ca parivāritaḥ ||
pāvanī ca vareṇyā ca varārhāvaradā varā|
golokaḥ śivalokaś ca eka eva vidhīyate ||
tasmād ūrdhaṃ paraṃ jñeyaṃ sthānatrayam anuttamam|
vyakto 'sau siddhayogī bhavati ca niyataṃ yas tu cittaprasannaḥ|
pitryaṃ yo gītapūrvaṃ pratidina śataśa uddhriyante ca sarve
ātmānaṃ nirvikalpaṃ śivapadam asamaṃ prāpnuvantīha sarve ||
lg.ab: iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe śāstravarṇanā nāma caturviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
